name: Bare Bones
description:
When you choose not to equip armor, you have a base Armor Score of 3 + your Strength and use the following as your base damage thresholds:

  • Tier 1: 9/19
  • Tier 2: 11/24
  • Tier 3: 13/31
  • Tier 4: 15/38

name: Composite Riot Carapace
description: Full-coverage composite plating over impact mesh. Heavy, loud, and built to walk through riots.

name: Impact-Padded Street Vest
description: A padded street vest with shock-absorbing gel plates—cheap insurance against fists, batons, and stray shrapnel.

name: KevFlex Jacket
description: Lightweight synthetic leather threaded with flexible Kevlar weave—keeps you quick without feeling naked.

name: Slash-Resistant Polymer Jacket
description: Medium-weight body armor woven from advanced polymer rings designed to resist slashes and punctures—perfect for Megatropolis alleys.

name: Advanced Slash-Resistant Jacket
description: Polymer-link weave with ceramic micro-scales; shrugs off knives and claws.

name: Auto-Heal Laminate
description: Self-tightening fibers that cinch when stressed, buying you precious seconds before a breach.

name: CeramSteel Chest Rig
description: Ceramic-steel sandwich paneling that hardens under impact—your torso becomes a problem for bullets.

name: Enhanced Riot Carapace
description: Optimized riot carapace with servo assists at the knees and shoulders—still heavy, now meaner.

name: Ghoststep Weave
description: Sound-dampened cloth and frictionless seams—made for slipping past guards and cameras alike.

name: Hope Bank Vest
description: Embedded charge cells let you spend armor power instead of precious morale in tight spots.

name: KevFlex Jacket Mk II
description: Upgraded synthetic leather with doubled Kevlar threading—lightweight, better seams, cleaner lines.

name: Kinetic Shift Harness
description: Micro-actuators twitch armor segments just before impact, deflecting strikes at the last millisecond.

name: Reinforced Street Vest
description: Up-armored padding with denser gels and better dispersion. Looks cheap, works miracles.

name: Assault Carapace
description: Assault-rated composite plating with shock collars and full-joint reinforcement. Try not to run.

name: Failsafe Exo-Plate
description: When life hits critical, an emergency surge routes damage to the frame while you grit your teeth.

name: KevFlex Trench
description: Long-cut coat with segmented Kevlar—style and survivability in one package.

name: Kinetic-Only Bulwark
description: Optimized to blunt physical force; don’t expect it to help against witchware or weird grids.

name: Pain Route Harness
description: Routes shock into your nervous system—hurts like hell, but the armor holds.

name: Razor-Stud Carapace
description: Barbs and razor-studs turn every clinch into a mistake—for them.

name: Slash-Resistant Polymer Coat
description: Full-length polymer-link coat—blades skate, you keep walking.

name: Tactical Gel Suit
description: Combat-grade gel padding bonded to compression mesh—soaks hits, keeps you moving.

name: Caster’s Conduit Harness
description: Latticed conduits that route arcane surge cleanly—focus in, cast true.

name: Double-Buffer Plating
description: Overbuilt dampers that soak two steps of hurt every time you brace.

name: Emberguard Mantle
description: Heat-reactive panels flare with plasma warnings; anyone who swings in close gets a nasty surprise.

name: Legendary Assault Carapace
description: Black-ops composite suit meant to take a rocket and keep you upright.

name: Legendary Gel Suit
description: Top-shelf military gel plates with memory response—light, flexible, absurdly tough.

name: Legendary KevFlex Trench
description: A couture armored trench with next-gen weave and embedded countermeasures.

name: Legendary Polymer Coat
description: Masterwork polymer-link coat—cutter-proof and photogenic.

name: Savior Polymer Aegis
description: Last-stand jacket that trades comfort, grace, and everything else for brutal survivability.

name: Timeslip Silks
description: Exotic silks with micro-time skew—edge reality for a moment when the shot is coming.

name: Truthlight Carapace
description: Embedded truth-sensors flare when lies hit the air—corp meetings just got interesting.
